Reviews.Title: Wonderful communication device.
Reviews.Author: JJMRVCLINY "JimMLINY"
Reviews.Content: Downgraded to it from my first BlackBerry Q10 running new BB OS 10.  This legacy device would be perfect if it could handle 4G/LTE.  the trackball, with the call buttons make it a spectacular smartphone, bar none!

Reviews.Title: BlackBerry Bold 9930
Reviews.Author: Anke Konrad
Reviews.Content: I love this phone! In general I am not a touch screen fan, especially because I use my phone a lot for email. But the Combination between touch screen and the qwerty keyboard  is awesome. I also love the operating system. Yeah, so you cannot get all the same games as android and i-phone users, but if you use your phone for work or really anything useful rather than pure games/social networking, then you'll love this!
